## ðŸ¤– AI Industry Snapshot - 2025-11-06

### Top AI Stories

1. [Google Launches FREE AI Course (With Certificate & Swags!)](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=1tlDCW42Bag)

2. [AI Full Course 2025 | AI Tutorial for Beginners | Artificial Intelligence Course | Simplilearn](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=LGCZ-Fhm48c)

3. [What Is an AI Stack? LLMs, RAG, & AI Hardware](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=RRKwmeyIc24)

4. [Ep 1: Transformation of AI & What Are LLMs | Using MCP with LLMs | MSI India](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=e0LCvVc6LEU)

5. [AI Models Explained | The Future of Artificial Intelligence | Professor Rahul Jain](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=D_biRLCtGks)

6. [Experiments in LLMs â€“ Everything I've learned (so far) â€“ Part One â€“ Fine tuning](https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36381832)

7. [Experiments in LLMs â€“ OpenAI Functions](https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36534635)

8. [Experiments in LLMs â€“ Vector DBs and Embeddings](https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36447740)

9. [Show HN: AI-Powered Twitter Filter](https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=39210964)

10. [Show HN: AI/ML Weekly Digest â€“ Curated by LLM, Summarized and Sentiment-Analyzed](https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=37954932)

### AI Trends Summary

Google has introduced a free AI course, complete with certification and swag, making artificial intelligence education more accessible to a broader audience. Simplilearn is offering an extensive AI course for beginners, aiming for completion in 2025, signifying the growing demand for AI education and skill development. The content also delves into the technical foundations and future of AI, with discussions on AI stacks, including Large Language Models (LLMs), Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG), AI hardware, and the transformative role of AI highlighted by the use of MCP (Massive Computational Power) with LLMs, as explored by MSI India. Additionally, Professor Rahul Jain's insights into AI models shed light on the anticipated advancements and the future landscape of artificial intelligence. These items collectively underscore a significant push towards educating a wider audience on AI fundamentals, applications, and the evolving nature of AI technology.

business_news.markdown:
## ðŸ’¼ Business News - 2025-11-06

### Top Stories

1. [Bessent says Supreme Court tariff hearing 'went very well' for Trump administration](https://www.foxbusiness.com/politics/bessent-supreme-court-tariff-hearing-went-very-well-trump-administration)

2. [These 10 states offer the biggest property tax savings for American homeowners](https://www.foxbusiness.com/real-estate/these-10-states-offer-biggest-property-tax-savings-american-homeowners)

3. [National Debt Tracker: American taxpayers (you) are now on the hook for $38,047,239,753,103.02 as of 11/5/25](https://www.foxbusiness.com/economy/us-national-debt-tracker)

4. [LARRY KUDLOW: The Trump economy is booming](https://www.foxbusiness.com/politics/larry-kudlow-trump-economy-booming)

5. [Duffy announces airspace restrictions amid record government shutdown](https://www.foxbusiness.com/fox-news-air-space/duffy-announces-airspace-restrictions-amid-record-government-shutdown)

6. [Trump says American dream is 'surging back to life' under his presidency at Miami forum](https://www.foxbusiness.com/media/trump-says-american-dream-surging-back-life-under-his-presidency-miami-forum)

7. [Trump touts private sector job growth, efforts to shrink federal workforce](https://www.foxbusiness.com/economy/trump-touts-private-sector-job-growth-efforts-shrink-federal-workforce)

8. [Pressure mounts on Hochul to back Mamdaniâ€™s plan to raise taxes for NYC](https://www.foxbusiness.com/politics/pressure-mounts-hochul-back-mamdanis-plan-raise-taxes-nyc)

9. [Ford temporarily halts Kentucky plant operations after deadly UPS plane crash](https://www.foxbusiness.com/retail/ford-temporarily-halts-kentucky-plant-operations-after-deadly-ups-plane-crash)

10. [Ice cream bars sold in over 30 states recalled due to 'life-threatening' allergy risk](https://www.foxbusiness.com/retail/ice-cream-bars-sold-over-30-states-recalled-due-life-threatening-allergy-risk)

### Summary

The Supreme Court hearing on tariffs reportedly went favorably for the Trump administration, according to Bessent. In the realm of personal finance, a report highlights the ten states offering the most significant property tax savings for homeowners. Meanwhile, the national debt has surged to over $38 trillion, placing a substantial burden on American taxpayers. Commentary from Larry Kudlow asserts that, despite these challenges, the Trump economy is experiencing significant growth. Additionally, Duffy has announced airspace restrictions, a move that comes amid the longest government shutdown on record, hinting at the administration's efforts to address security and operational concerns during this period.

tech_news.markdown:
## ðŸ’» Tech News - 2025-11-06

### Top Stories

1. [Token-Oriented Object Notation (Toon)](https://github.com/toon-format/toon)

2. [Dynamic Code Execution with MCP: A More Efficient Approach](https://github.com/pranftw/aiter-app)

3. [People abused by intimate partners have worse asthma](https://theconversation.com/people-abused-by-intimate-partners-have-worse-asthma-but-researchers-are-still-untangling-the-reasons-behind-this-surprising-link-263508)

4. [Summary of fusion energy sector progress](https://twitter.com/exodusorbitals/status/1986241434635354223)

5. [Seeking feedback: Integrated user-research workflow tool](https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=45830436)

6. [Ranked: The World's Wealthiest Nations in 2025](https://www.visualcapitalist.com/ranked-the-worlds-wealthiest-nations-in-2025/)

7. [Toyota "Can Barely Cover the Demand" for Its Cars](https://www.kbb.com/car-news/toyota-can-barely-cover-the-demand-for-its-cars/)

8. [New curriculum to give young people the skills for life and work](https://www.gov.uk/government/news/new-curriculum-to-give-young-people-the-skills-for-life-and-work)

9. [Permit shows Micro Center could bring tech products to North Austin](https://communityimpact.com/austin/northwest-austin/business/2025/08/29/permit-shows-micro-center-could-bring-tech-products-to-north-austin/)

10. [Texas community votes no on incorporating to fight Bitcoin mine](https://www.texastribune.org/2025/11/05/texas-hood-county-bitcoin-noise-city-vote-fail/)

### Summary

1. Token-Oriented Object Notation (Toon) introduces an innovative data serialization format optimized for simplicity and speed, aiming to enhance data interchange between applications and systems with a focus on efficiency and minimal overhead.

2. Dynamic Code Execution with MCP presents a novel technique for executing code that significantly improves computational efficiency and flexibility, allowing for more dynamic and responsive software development processes.

3. A study highlights a concerning correlation between individuals abused by intimate partners and a higher incidence of worsened asthma conditions, suggesting the need for healthcare providers to consider the impacts of personal relationships on physical health.

4. The fusion energy sector has witnessed significant advancements, with researchers making progress in the development of sustainable and potentially limitless energy sources, marking critical steps towards achieving commercially viable fusion power.

5. The call for feedback on an integrated user-research workflow tool reflects a growing emphasis on enhancing the user experience design process through streamlined, feedback-oriented tools that facilitate more effective and user-centered product development.
